code: import{useContext}from'react';import StyleSheet from"react-native-web/dist/exports/StyleSheet";import{ThemeContext}from'./ThemeProvider';export const useTheme=()=>{return useContext(ThemeContext);};export const makeStyles=styles=>(props={})=>{const{theme}=useTheme();const css=typeof styles==='function'?styles(theme,props):styles;return StyleSheet.create(css);};
